name: Pop It! (yumna_m)
description:
"Pop It!" is a 2D game in which you must pop bubbles in a side-scrolling game world before the time runs out. Although the core concept is the same in all levels (popping bubbles in a limited period of time), each has its own distinct surroundings, difficulties, and pleasure. You, as a player, must be wary of the obstacles that stand in your way of enjoying your favorite pastime of bursting bubbles.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Use the right and left arrow keys to move right and left

Use the space bar to jump

The game can be paused using the "p" key

IMPORTANT:

The quit button does not work in the online version, yet it does in the PC version. This is due to the fact that while utilizing a WebGL file, it is not feasible to close the window.

You may also hear a "click" sound when you hit the space bar. Yes! It was not intentional; it is again caused by the WebGL file format, which works well with the PC version.

NOTICE:

The game is developed for educational purposes.
